actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.

official_title: A bill to extend temporarily the suspension of duty on Mixtures of N-[[(4,6-dimethoxypyrimidin-2-yl)amino]carbonyl]-3-(ethylsulfonyl)-2-pyridinesulfonamide and application adjuvants, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Amends the Harmonized Tariff Schedule of the United States to extend temporarily the suspension of duty on Mixtures of N-[[(4,6-dimethoxypyrimidin-2-yl)amino]carbonyl]-3-(ethylsulfonyl)-2-pyridinesulfonamide and application adjuvants.

titles.title: A bill to extend temporarily the suspension of duty on Mixtures of N-[[(4,6-dimethoxypyrimidin-2-yl)amino]carbonyl]-3-(ethylsulfonyl)-2-pyridinesulfonamide and application adjuvants, and for other purposes.
